_comment_description: Students match appropriate headings to paragraphs or sections of the reading passage.
_comment_use_case: Reading Passage 1/2/3, paragraph comprehension, main idea identification

_field_descriptions.answer_key: Roman numeral of correct heading (i, ii, iii, etc.)
_field_descriptions.headings: Array of available headings with roman numeral values

_validation_rules.answer_key: Roman numeral matching one heading value (i, ii, iii, iv, v, vi, etc.)
_validation_rules.headings: Array of objects with 'value' (roman numeral) and 'text' (heading)

_heading_characteristics.style: Brief, descriptive phrases capturing paragraph main idea
_heading_characteristics.specificity: Specific enough to distinguish between similar topics
_heading_characteristics.abstraction: General enough to cover entire paragraph content
